Hello and welcome to my personal website. The purpose of this page is to provide a listing of projects I am working on and have completed, both professionally and academically. I will also keep a current version of my resume here for potential employers.

I have recently earned an Associates degree in computer programming and am working towards earning certification in Web Development from Macomb Community College. I am currently looking for an entry-level position or internship in software or web development.
